entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 6:04 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -21.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
